websocket.pathMismatch: Path does not match path={path}, returning 404
websocket.socketMissingMethods: WebSocket object missing required methods. Properties: {adapterKeys}, prototype: {prototypeKeys}
websocket.socketMissingMethodsConstructor: WebSocket object received in constructor missing required methods
websocket.socketNoMessageListener: WebSocket object does not support message listener. Type: {type}, keys: {keys}

websocketClient.notConnectedCannotSendBinary: WebSocket not connected, cannot send binary

adapterRedis.needConnectionOrClient: RedisAdapter requires connection config or client instance
adapterRedis.cannotCreateClient: Cannot create Redis client: {error}. Ensure redis package is installed (npm install redis)
adapterRedis.cannotCreatePubSubClient: Cannot create Redis Pub/Sub client: {error}. Ensure redis package is installed (npm install redis)

adapterMongo.clientNotInstalled: MongoDB client not installed. Install mongodb package: deno add npm:mongodb
adapterMongo.connectFailedReplicaSet: MongoDB connection failed (replica set): {error}. Hint: If using single-node replica set, add replicaSet to config
adapterMongo.createIndexFailed: Failed to create MongoDB index (may already exist)
adapterMongo.changeStreamsUnavailable: MongoDB Change Streams unavailable (single-node mode), falling back to polling
